column3: News;Kampong Speu:------Â Authorities on the afternoon of October 20
column4: 2018 said that at 9 am there were serious floods near Chum Kos village
column7: Kompong Speu province. The flooding severely damaged the 120 meter long dam
column8: causing a breach.------There were immediate reports of 10 people missing in the aftermath
column10: but all were later accounted for and are now safe.------Authorities said that the cause of the dam failure was a result of torrential rain overnight
